properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성(Copy Activity Sink에서 precopy script로 적용)

- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Current Month > Sink > Precopy script 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Sink > Precopy script 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O06100
 WHERE CALDAY >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND CALDAY <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o06100 
where calday >= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1 months'), 'YYYYMMDD')
and calday <= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_date)::date-1, 'YYYYMMDD');

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O06100
 WHERE CALDAY >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND CALDAY <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o06100 
where calday >= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_date), 'YYYYMMDD')
and calday <= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_date + interval '1 months')::date - 1, 'YYYYMMDD');

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O06200
 WHERE CALDAY >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND CALDAY <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o06200 
where calday >= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours'), 'YYYYMMDD')
and calday <= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' + interval '1 months')::date - 1, 'YYYYMMDD');

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  CALMONTH    
,CALDAY      
,COMP_CODE   
,SALES_DIST  
,PLANT       
,PURCH_ORG   
,PUR_GROUP   
,VENDOR      
,MATERIAL    
,DOCTYPE     
,UNIT        
,ZEA         
,ZKG         
,ZBOX        
,ZBQUAN      
,ZKRWAMT     
,ZSRM_CAMT   
,CURRENCY    
,ZPP_MQTY    
  FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}
where calday between '@{variables('prev_start')}' and '@{variables('prev_end')}'

SELECT   CALDAY            
			  ,CALWEEK               
			  ,CALMONTH  
			  ,CUSTCLS1_CODE 
			  ,CUSTCLS1_NAME 
			  ,MATERIAL  
			  ,ZPOSAMT
			  ,ZPOSQTY  
			  ,ZONGBN
  FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}
where CALDAY between '@{variables('prev_start')}' and '@{variables('prev_end')}'

SELECT  PYEAR
,PLSCN
,PMNTH
,MATNR
,EKORG
,WERKS
,KONWA
,KMEIN
,KPEIN
,PEINH
,YSUNK
,DMBTR
,SUYUL
,YULUN
,LABOR
,MTART
,MATKL
,SPART
,ERDAT
,ERNAM
,AEDAT
,AENAM
,BUKRS
  FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}
where PYEAR >= '@{variables('year')}'

SELECT BUDAT   
,MBLNR   
,MJAHR   
,ZEILE   
,WERKS   
,MATNR   
,LIFNR   
,NAME1   
,ERFMG   
,ERFME   
,PRICE   
,DMBTR   
,KBETR_T 
,NETPR   
,KBETR_U 
,WAERS   
,BPRME   
,PEINH   
,LGORT   
,LGOBE   
,EBELN   
,EBELP   
  FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}
where BUDAT between '@{variables('prev_start')}' and '@{variables('prev_end')}'

SELECT  BUDAT
,MBLNR
,MJAHR
,ZEILE
,WERKS
,MATNR
,MAKTX
,BWART
,BTEXT
,ERFME
,ERFMG
,PRICE
,DMBTR
,LGORT
,LGOBE
,MATN1
,MAKT1
,SHKZG
,DISPO
,DSNAM
,WAERS
,ZDATA
,ZTIME
,ZNAME
,BUKRS   
  FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}
where BUDAT between '@{variables('prev_start')}' and '@{variables('prev_end')}'

preCopyScript.value:
DELETE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SinkTable}
WHERE BUDAT BETWEEN '@{variables('str_date')}' AND '@{variables('end_date')}'

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHBD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHBD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHHD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHHD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_DPSITINFO
 WHERE DPSITYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND DPSITYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_DPSITINFO
 WHERE DPSITYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND DPSITYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_MILEAGETRAN
 WHERE USEYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND USEYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_MILEAGETRAN
 WHERE USEYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND USEYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)
